description: This file contains unit tests for the AppComponent of an Angular application implementing a Tic Tac Toe game. It includes tests for component creation, rendering, game logic, winner detection, and game reset functionality.

classes.name: AppComponent
classes.description: Main component class for the Tic Tac Toe game, managing game state, rendering, and user interactions.

methods.name: handleCellClick
methods.description: Handles user clicking on a cell, updating the game state accordingly.

methods.name: resetGame
methods.description: Resets the game to the initial state.

methods.name: currentPlayer
methods.description: Returns the symbol of the current player ('X' or 'O').

methods.name: statusText
methods.description: Returns the current status message of the game.

methods.name: winner
methods.description: Determines if there is a winner, returning 'X' or 'O' if so, or null otherwise.

methods.name: gameOver
methods.description: Checks if the game has ended either by a win or a draw.

methods.name: board
methods.description: Returns the current state of the game board.

methods.name: getIconForMark
methods.description: Returns the icon representation for a given mark ('X' or 'O').
